ArticleTitle.sentence: Interleukin-10 stabilizes inhibitory kappaB-alpha in human monocytes.

event.clue: Interleukin-10 stabilizes inhibitory kappaB-alpha in human monocytes.

AbstractText.sentence: Interleukin-10 (IL-10) protects animals from lethal endotoxemia.

event.clue: Interleukin-10 (IL-10) protects animals from lethal endotoxemia.

AbstractText.sentence: This beneficial effect is mediated, in part, by inhibition of inflammatory cytokine production, including tumor necrosis factor-alpha (TNF-alpha).

AbstractText.sentence: Monocytes were isolated from human donors.
Cells were stimulated with endotoxin (LPS, 100 ng/mL) with and without human IL-10 (10 ng/mL).
